channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Google Acquires Top Talent From AI Voice Startup Hume AI in Licensing Deal
item.description: Hume AI’s CEO, Alan Cowen, will join Google DeepMind along with several top engineers as part of a major licensing deal.

item.title: 7 Best Smart Locks (2026) for Front Doors, Side Doors, and Even Garages
item.description: Upgrade your locks with fingerprint-scanning or a keypad, whether it’s at the front door or a sliding glass entryway.

item.title: Under Armour says it’s ‘aware’ of data breach claims after 72M customer records were posted online
item.description: TechCrunch obtained a sample of the stolen data, which contained names, email addresses, dates of birth, and the user's approximate geographic locatio...

item.title: Snapchat gives parents new insights into teens’ screen time and friends
item.description: With these new features, Snap is likely looking to appease regulators and parents over concerns about safety and screen time on its platform.

item.title: Here’s what you should know about the US TikTok deal
item.description: A number of investors are competing for the opportunity to purchase the app, and if a deal were to go through, the platform's U.S. business could have...

item.title: From invisibility cloaks to AI chips: Neurophos raises $110M to build tiny optical processors for inferencing
item.description: Neurophos is taking a crack at solving the AI industry's power efficiency problem with an optical chip that uses a composite material to do the math r...

item.title: Quadric rides the shift from cloud AI to on-device inference — and it’s paying off
item.description: Quadric aims to help companies and governments build programmable on-device AI chips that can run fast-changing models locally.

item.title: Google’s AI Mode can now tap into your Gmail and Photos to provide tailored responses
item.description: The company notes that AI Mode doesn’t train directly on your Gmail inbox or Google Photos library. Instead, it trains on specific prompts and the mod...

item.title: A Wikipedia Group Made a Guide to Detect AI Writing. Now a Plug-In Uses It to ‘Humanize’ Chatbots
item.description: The web’s best resource for spotting AI writing has ironically become a manual for AI models to hide it.

item.title: Google reportedly snags up team behind AI voice startup Hume AI
item.description: Google has hired the CEO and top top behind voice AI startup Hume AI, signaling that voice is increasingly becoming the preferred interface over scree...
